cmd.help:
List of commands:
{white-fg}/quit{/white-fg} - Close this program.
{white-fg}/connect{/white-fg} - Connect to Steam servers.
{white-fg}/disconnect{/white-fg} - Disconnect from Steam servers.
{white-fg}/w NUM{/white-fg} - Change to window specified with number.
{white-fg}/scrollf{/white-fg} - Scroll chat window forward a screen.
{white-fg}/scrollb{/white-fg} - Scroll chat window back a screen.
{white-fg}/part{/white-fg} - Leave the chat or PM and close the window.
{white-fg}/accept{/white-fg} - Accept your pending friend requests. {yellow-fg}[list]{/yellow-fg}
{white-fg}/join [chatID]{/white-fg} - Arg: Join specified chat room. No arg: Join the chat room you were last invited to.
{white-fg}/persona NAME{/white-fg} - Change your username.
{white-fg}/add ID{/white-fg} - Send a friend request.
{white-fg}/pm [username | ID]{/white-fg} - Arg: Start a conversation with the user with the following username or Steam ID. No arg: Select a user in your friends list to message. {yellow-fg}[list]{/yellow-fg}
{white-fg}/block ID{/white-fg} - Add a user to your ignore list.
{white-fg}/unblock ID{/white-fg} - Remove a user from your ignore list.
{white-fg}/saveconfig{/white-fg} - Save your login credentials to 'config.json'. Warning: Stored in plain-text.
{white-fg}/set OPTION VALUE{/white-fg} - Change the value of one of the following options.
   {white-fg}username VALUE{/white-fg} - Required for login.
   {white-fg}password VALUE{/white-fg} - Required for login.
   {white-fg}guardcode VALUE{/white-fg} - If you have Steam Guard enabled, please specify a Steam Guard Code with this command. If you haven't received a Guard Code yet, you may login without a Guard Code to have it sent.
   {white-fg}twofactor VALUE{/white-fg} - If you use Steam Mobile Authentication, you'll need to enter your two-factor code with this command.
   {white-fg}userlistwidth NUM{/white-fg} - Specify width of userlist window in characters.
   {white-fg}scrollback NUM{/white-fg} - Specify how many lines to keep as a scrollback buffer in chat windows.
{white-fg}/autojoin CMD [arg]{/white-fg} - Interact with the autojoin array, allowing you to select which group chats to automatically join when you login.
   {white-fg}add [ID]{/white-fg} - Arg: Add specified chat ID to autojoin array. No arg: Add current group chat to autojoin array.
   {white-fg}del [ID | index]{/white-fg} - Arg: Remove specified chat ID or index number (counting from zero) from autojoin array. No arg: Remove current group chat from autojoin array.
   {white-fg}list{/white-fg} - List the autojoin array.
   {white-fg}run{/white-fg} - Join the group chats in the autojoin array. Useful if you have just added a chat ID and don't want to restart.
{white-fg}/debug{/white-fg} - Toggle debug mode.
{white-fg}/dump{/white-fg} - Take a dump of the Steam object for debugging purposes.
{yellow-fg}[list]{/yellow-fg} - A list of entries is spawned in the userlist window. Use 'j' and 'k' or the arrow keys to scroll through the items and press 'Enter' to make a selection. Press 'q' if you wish to cancel the selection.
